parameters.param:
rm -rf build mkdir build cd build
cmake ../ProTouchApiSimulator -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ninja || exit 1 ninja install || exit 1

mkdir build cd build
qmake ../ProTouchApiSimulator CONFIG+=release "QMAKE_CXX=ccache g++" make -j%teamcity.agent.hardware.cpuCount% || exit 1

echo "Copying mingw32 dependencies..." cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libjbig-0.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libwebpmux-3.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libwebpdemux-2.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libwebp-7.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libLerc.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libdeflate.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\liblzma-5.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libtiff-5.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\liblcms2-2.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libmng-2.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libjpeg-8.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libjasper-4.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libpcre-1.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libiconv-2.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libintl-8.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libglib-2.0-0.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libicuin69.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libbrotlicommon.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libgraphite2.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libbrotlidec.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libbz2-1.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libfreetype-6.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libicudt69.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libpng16-16.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libharfbuzz-0.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libicuuc69.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libpcre2-16-0.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libzstd.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libmd4c.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\zlib1.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libdouble-conversion.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libwinpthread-1.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libstdc++-6.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libgcc_s_dw2-1.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libzmq.dll build/release/ cp -f -n C:\msys2_pt3\mingw32\bin\libsodium-23.dll build/release/ echo "Deploying qt..." echo windeployqt.exe build\release\ProTouchApiSimulator.exe --force --verbose 2 --qmldir ProTouchApiSimulator --compiler-runtime windeployqt.exe build\release\ProTouchApiSimulator.exe --force --verbose 2 --qmldir ProTouchApiSimulator --compiler-runtime

rm -rf build mkdir build cd build
cmake ../ProTouchApiSimulator -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="c:\msys2_pt3\mingw64\qt5-static" ninja
ntldd ProTouchApiSimulator.exe
